name: @ai-on-browser/data-analysis-models
description: Data analysis model package without any dependencies

scripts.test:lib: npm run create-entry && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --testMatch '**/lib/**/?(*.)+(spec|test).[jt]s?(x)' --coverage --coveragePathIgnorePatterns '/node_modules/' 'onnx/onnx_pb.js' --reporters default ./tests/retry-test.js ./tests/slow-test.js --maxWorkers=100% --workerIdleMemoryLimit=100MB
scripts.types: npm run create-entry && find lib -name \*.d.ts -delete && tsc ./lib/**.js ./lib/**/*.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.document: npm run create-entry && documentation build lib/index.js -f html --github -o docs && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --minify-css true --minify-js true -o ./docs/index.html ./docs/index.html
scripts.minify: find . -name \*.js | grep -E '^./(lib|js)' | xargs -t -P2 -n1 -I% npx terser % -c -m -o % && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --minify-css true --minify-js true -o ./index.html ./index.html
scripts.build:gh-pages: npm run document && sed -i -e /^doc/d .gitignore && npm run minify
scripts.build:npm: npm run types && npm run format
